trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_SEQ_00<tab>Aeluuin is concerned for the well-being of one of his customers.
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_SEQ_01<tab>A young woman who has reserved a room at the Bobbing Cork has yet to arrive, and Aeluuin fears the worst. Seek out the woman and see to her safety.
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_SEQ_02<tab>You have dispatched the fiend that was threatening the young adventurer. Speak with her and calm her nerves.

TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_SEQ_03<tab>The young adventurer offers her thanks; she was so taken with the scenery that she failed to notice the fiend's presence. Return to the Bobbing Cork and assure Aeluuin that his customer is safe.

TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_SEQ_04<tab>Aeluuin is relieved for your tidings. What with fearsome rumors circulating of late, he feels ever more responsible for his customers' safety. He will prepare a warm bed and hot meal for the girl, that she might forget her ordeal.

TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_AELUUIN_000_000<tab>Just look at the time! Whatever is keeping her? ...My apologies, friend. You've caught me in a fretful humour. A young girl has reserved a room with me tonight, yet she's nowhere to be found.
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_AELUUIN_000_001<tab>There're ill rumors about these parts of late─try as I might, I can't help but fear the worst. Might you be so kind as to go check if she's well?
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_ADVENTURE_000_013<tab>Beautiful sights to be seen in these parts, yes? It's a shame that the dangers are too great to truly enjoy them...
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_ADVENTURE_000_015<tab>Thank you, friend! Why, I thought I was done for!
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_ADVENTURE_000_016<tab>One moment, I was standing here enjoying the scenery while my chocobo enjoyed a much-deserved nap, and the next...

TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_ADVENTURE_000_017<tab>It sends shivers down my spine just to recall it. Anyroad, please thank the innkeep for his concern, and tell him I will be on my way as soon as my bird awakes.
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_ADVENTURE_000_018<tab>Please thank the innkeep for his concern, and tell him I will be on my way as soon as my bird awakes...though he is a rather heavy sleeper, I fear.
TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_AELUUIN_000_020<tab>The girl's safe? Thank you, friend─those are the best tidings I've received all day. And here I'd feared the worst...

TEXT_GAIUSA809_00793_AELUUIN_000_021<tab>Why, if she'd ended up in the clutches of that masked... But I mustn't think such ill thoughts. Now, if you'll excuse me, I'd best get back to work─something tells me the girl'll be needing a warm bed and a hot meal more than ever.
